short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Submit the current page's URL, title, and description to Upviber.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: As you surf the web you may click on this extension's icon if you think the page you're on is vibing. A new tab will open and that page's information will be populated in Upviber's submission form.
